pageProduct.name: Palmers Olive Oil Formula Deep Conditioner 60g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer’s® Olive Oil Formula® intensive conditioner treatment is loaded with Extra Virgin Olive Oil and fortified with an exclusive Botanical Scalp Complex blend to: - Provide essential vitamins and minerals to dry, damaged hair. - Penetrate deep to restore moisture and shine. - Strengthen weak, brittle hair, helping it grow longer by minimising breakage, leaving hair silky and healthy.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Give hair a deep repairing treatment with the power of antioxidant rich Extra Virgin Olive Oil. Jamaican Black Castor Oil has a strong lipid content which helps relieve dry itchy scalp while protecting hair from styling damage.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Stearyl Alcohol, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dimethicone, Tocopherol Acetate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Equisetum Arvense Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Hyssopus Officinalis Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Hydrolyzed Silk, Myristyl Alcohol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Disodium EDTA, Isopropyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Yellow 5 (Cl 19140), Blue 1 (Cl 42090), Red 4 (Cl 14700), Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Lauryl Alcohol

Directions

After shampooing with Palmer's Olive Oil Formula shampoo, distribute thrugh hair, coating strands evenly and focusing on ends. Leave on for 2-5 minutes before rinsing. If using as an overnight treatment, cover hair with a plastic cap and rinse out in the morning.
